title: Ticket #372: Flocked jobs reported as not running in flocked-to collector, view col
description: Jobs flocked to a pool other than the one they are submitted on are not reported as running in the condor view collector. (In fact, they are also not reported as running in the "normal" collector of the pool they flock to.) We suspect that there's some problem in the logic in Scheduler::count_jobs() that messes around with the job counts when reporting to "flocked to" pools.
creator: wenger
